website_summaries.verdict: The tiny, relatively affordable Yuneec Breeze places an emphasis on ease of use, but it isn't as capable as many other drones.

customer_reviews.title: Would be great. But it is not.
customer_reviews.text: Great WHEN WORKING. But lost wifi almost every flight. Also works only on 5gh wifi. So it was a waste money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sandor Bozsanyi

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless. Would not even generate a wifi network so impossible to connect to. Thought it might be a one off but then googled the issue, this is a widespread fault. Returned for a refund. Don't waste your time!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, unable to establish a wifi connection with any device, from previous review comment more common than people are admitting. Yuneec UK customer service very helpful in confirming that if a blue or green light is not being emitted from the front left rota arm, in my case a white fault light LED then there is no WiFi being transmitted from the drone, so I spent a couple of frustrating hours fault eliminating before having to send the product back, maybe this start up advice could be published in the instruction manual, shame looks like a nice well made piece of kit that doesn't work which i'm not going to be able to take away with me on holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fraud
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with iPhone WiFi frequency. Save yourself trouble and do not order.
customer_reviews.author: Rocc

customer_reviews.title: Absolute rubbish. This is my third yuneec breeze as ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish. This is my third yuneec breeze as the first two did not not work at all. This one does not work either. Will not connect to wifi and when it does asks for firmware upgrade which sometimes downloads then will not reconnect to drone to download upgrade. Not fit for purpose. How they can get away with charging £350 for this junk is beyond me. Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... me i missed the return date 31 Jan very disappointed 299 pounds down the
customer_reviews.text: Brought this drone was a present for a friend at Christmas it has never works by the time my friend got it back to me i missed the return date 31 Jan very disappointed 299 pounds down the drain
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little drone - cheap for the amount of tech inside it.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is an excellent little drone. Took it on my honeymoon and got some incredible footage. Wifi connection worked extremely well. Updating the software took some patience but it did it completely after some patience from me! Would have given it 5 stars otherwise. Performed very well in pretty strong winds. The video stabilisation capability is great, as my films were completely level despite the angle of attack the drone had to adopt to counter the wind. Next step up would be to allow the use of the 4k recording with stabilisation engaged as sadly when trying to record in 4k it disengages. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Good selfie drone but...
customer_reviews.text: ... interesting to see others are having issues. This is an aerial robot and it only knows what it can sense. I've lost connection once (regained to bring in a successful landing) and crashed twice under trees (should have disconnected GPS!). Works ok with my iPhone 6S. But not a toy...
customer_reviews.author: isvana

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but the wifi connection troubles have ruined this wee drone for me... 1st drone connected no problem then demanded a firmware update, after the update it didn't emit wifi so was useless. sent t back and got a replacement and had exactly the same issue. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Reacher

customer_reviews.title: Fly's well and is stable with GPS locked. However ...
customer_reviews.text: Fly's well and is stable with GPS locked. However losses connection to iPhone fairly often and returns to its starting point, which worried me a lot the first time it just took off and flew away by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Elaine M. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy one of these, the wifi connection ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy one of these, the wifi connection is extremely unreliable. A recent firmware update caused the connection to become unstable and drop out mid flight, yuneec knew of the problem but chose not to say anything about it. They have since released new firmware but it wont update due the connection problems. Yuneec are being less than helpful, I wish I had spend a little more and gone for DJI
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Skynet built drone that thinks you are Sarah Connor
customer_reviews.text: This was designed to kill you. Completed setup (pairing to controller was a ball ache), quick firmware update and calibrated the GPS/compass...well hovered and kept getting closer and closer to me until I ran away (nearly took my eye out it got that close) banked hard and crashed itself into a wall. If I hadn’t of moved I would have lost an eye. I’m not exaggerating, it has honestly worried me for when I next use it and kids or animals are around.
customer_reviews.author: Al

product_meta.title: Yuneec Breeze 4K Quadcopter Camera Drone with Automated Flight Modes and App Control - White
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Breeze 4K QuadcopterBreeze is the ﬂying camera designed with you in mind. Capturing aerial photos and videos of your daily adventures is now effortless – and it’s in stunning UHD 4K. Convenient and compact, Breeze is controlled by your iOS or Android device with the Breeze app and is impressively light at just under one pound. Take selﬁes, adjust camera settings or use one of its ﬁve automated ﬂight modes, all from the convenience of your smart device. Once you’ve captured the perfect shot, share it instantly to your favourite social media directly from the app. Thanks to the built-in Indoor Positioning System (IPS) Breeze can hold its position both indoors and outdoors, and Auto Take-Off and Landing means prior flight experience is not necessary. For the experienced flyers, Pilot mode allows you to ﬂy using manual control. Once you've captured photos and videos, you can share instantly to social media without leaving the app. Hashtag #myflyingcamera for a chance to be featured. Maximum flying height - 80 m

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Breeze Flying Camera
1 x Battery
1 x Charger
1 x Power cord
4 x Propeller guard
4 x Spare Rotor blades
feature_bullets: Easy to Use - No flight experience necessary
Ambarella Chipset - Ultra High quality 4K video and 13mp Stills
Automated Flight Modes - Follow Me, Selfie Mode, Pilot mode + more
Safety First - GPS, IPS and IR sensors ensure stable self-flight
